name: Art-Up
tag_list: internet, application, website, development, design, web
overview:
Art-Up began its activities in 2003 in Israel. Since then it has developed numerous websites, internet branding projects and online software for customers in Israel, Europe and the USA. These include serving a variety of businesses, such as investment houses, diamonds and jewelries companies, sports clubs and unions, law firms, restaurants, high-tech and bio-tech companies, startups, musicians, publishers, and real-estate companies.

Art-Up is not only developing and designing websites but is also transforming them into useful and powerful business tools, an essential marketing asset to any business nowadays.

All of the company’s websites designs are made in-house with an emphasis on a clean and unique look created especially for each and every customer. Art-Up’s content management systems are also made in-house by the company’s development team, making it easier to make adjustments according to specific demands.

Art-Up keeps its websites clear & clean as well as customized to the client’s needs while maintaining the W3C high standards.

Art-Up’s services include:

  • Website development
  • Website design
  • Dynamic CMS (Content Management System) development
  • On-demand CRM (Customer Relations Management) development
  • E-commerce website development
  • Flash application development
  • Search engine optimization
  • Banners design
  • Mini-sites development
  • Logo design
  • Business cards design
  • Folders design
  • Newsletter design
  • Professional photography
  • Video editing
  • Content management
  • Site hosting
  • Website maintenance
